content: wwwwooooooooddddssssmmmmaaaannnn ttttuuuuqqqquuuueeee wwwweeeeaaaarrrriiiinnnngggg aaaa hhhhaaaatttt kkkkeeeeeeeeppppssss yyyyoooouuuurrrr tttthhhhoooouuuugggghhhhttttssss wwwwaaaarrrrmmmm aaaannnndddd ccccoooossssyyyy………… wwwwooooooooddddssssmmmmaaaannnn ttttuuuuqqqquuuueeee size adult width- 61 cm/ 24 in length- 25 5 cm/ 10 in yarn 100g skein llama natural chunky by estelle yarns 125 m/ 114 yd undyed 80 % merino 20 % llama needles 5 00 mm/ us 8 gauge 14 sts and 24 row = 10 cm/ 4 in over pattern k knit p purl repeat repeat sts stitches decrease together this hat is worked flat with a side seam and is suitable for beginner knitters cast on 78 sts row 1 k2 p2 repeat to last 2 sts k2 row 2 p2 k2 repeat to last 2 sts p2 repeat these 2 row until work measures 23 cm/ 9 in ending with a row 2 shape top row 1 k2tog p2tog repeat to last 2 sts k2tog = sts row 2 p1 k1 repeat to last st p1 row 3 to 6 work sts as they appear row 7 k1 k2tog repeat to end = sts row 8 purl row 9 k2tog repeat to end = 10 sts cut yarn and thread through remaining sts tighten and secure end sew side seam reversing seam for fold back brim at approx 5 cm/ 2 in from cast on edge sew in ends design by michele meadows
